Dr. Eduard Matito

Position: Leader

Email: ematito@gmail.com

Website: https://ematito.dipc.org

Experience

  • Since Jan. 2024: Ikerbasque Professor at the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Mar. 2020: Ikerbasque Associate Researcher at the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Feb. 2018 – Mar. 2020: Ikerbasque Research Fellow at the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Apr. 2015 – Feb. 2018: Ikerbasque Research Fellow at the UPV/EHU and the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Dec. 2011 - Mar. 2015: Junior Group Leader, IQCC, UdG.

Education

  • 2006: Ph.D. in Chemistry; thesis supervised by Prof. Miquel Solà i Puig and Prof. Miquel Duran i Portas, Universitat de Girona, Girona, Spain.
  • 2004: M.S. in Chemistry, University of Girona, Girona, Spain.
  • 2002: B.S. in Chemistry, Universitat de Girona, Girona, Spain.

Research Topics

  • Currently he works in the development of electronic structure methods in the frameoworks of density functional theory (DFT), reduced density matrix functional theory (RDMFT), and wavefunction theory. Lately, part of his research is devoted to the adequacy of electronic structure methods to compute molecular properties. He also works in the fields of chemical bonding analysis and aromaticity.
